name: Evospace
description: Evospace is sandbox game with fully dynamic, procedurally generated world. Game about digging, exploring, building and technologies.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 2GB Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 770 2GB Storage: 5 GB available space
